snippet: Focus is divided in women’s pro soccer as some of the National Women’s Soccer League’s stars depart to prepare for this summer’s Women’s World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Focus is divided in women’s pro soccer as some of the National Women’s Soccer League’s stars depart to prepare for this summer’s Women’s World Cup.

headline.main: Parting for Women’s World Cup, but Hopefully Not for Good

keywords.name: organizations
